metadata.title: CVE-2019-17002 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
If upgrade-insecure-requests was specified in the Content Security Policy,and a link was dragged and dropped from that page, the link was notupgraded to https. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 70.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17002` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 70.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-geckodriver - 70.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 70.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '70.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
